companyOverview.title: Company Overview
companyOverview.description: Pledge & Grow is a digital innovation company focused on helping businesses transform and grow through technology solutions and strategic consulting.

consistentGrowth.title: Consistent Growth
consistentGrowth.description: 35% year-over-year revenue growth since our founding

marketReach.title: Market Reach
marketReach.description: Serving clients in over 5 countries worldwide

localRecognition.title: Recognition
localRecognition.description: Recognized locally in France and steadily increasing our reach

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To simplify digital transformation for businesses of all sizes, enabling them to grow, innovate, and succeed in an increasingly digital world.

investorsPhase.title: Investment Phases
investorsPhase.description: Our strategic investment plan is structured in three distinct phases, each offering unique opportunities for investors to participate in our growth journey.

seed.title: SEED
seed.description: Initial funding round for early-stage development and market validation.

grow.title: GROW
grow.description: Second funding phase focused on scaling operations and market expansion.

pledge.title: PLEDGE
pledge.description: Final investment phase for established business with proven market success.

investmentOpportunities.title: Future Opportunities
investmentOpportunities.description: Discover current and upcoming opportunities with Pledge & Grow. We offer various ways to participate in our growth and innovation journey.

events.title: Pledge & Events
events.description: Event management agency that transforms how businesses plan and execute corporate events.

cloud.title: Pledge & Cloud
cloud.description: Cloud infrastructure and hosting solutions with scalable architecture for businesses of all sizes.

properties.title: Pledge & Properties
properties.description: Real estate development and property management with innovative smart building technologies.

give.title: Pledge & Give
give.description: Foundation dedicated to supporting orphans and providing essential care and opportunities.

growthStrategy.title: Growth Strategy
growthStrategy.description: Our comprehensive growth strategy focuses on three key pillars:

expansion.title: Geographic Expansion
expansion.description: Establishing a strong presence in key European markets through strategic partnerships and local teams.

productDevelopment.title: Product Development
productDevelopment.description: Enhancing our digital transformation platform with AI capabilities and industry-specific solutions.

marketPenetration.title: Market Penetration
marketPenetration.description: Deepening our presence in existing markets through expanded service offerings and targeted marketing.

financialProjections.title: Financial Projections
financialProjections.description: Our financial projections reflect our ambitious growth plans and strong market position.
financialProjections.disclaimer: Note: These projections are based on current market conditions and company performance. Actual results may vary.

revenue.title: Revenue Growth
revenue.description: Projected 40% year-over-year revenue growth for the next three years.

profitability.title: Profitability
profitability.description: Expected to reach EBITDA positive by Q4 2025 with 15% margin by 2027.

marketShare.title: Market Share
marketShare.description: Targeting 8% market share in our core segments by 2027.

exitStrategy.title: Exit Strategy
exitStrategy.description: We have identified multiple potential exit paths for our investors:

acquisition.title: Strategic Acquisition
acquisition.description: Potential acquisition by larger technology or consulting firms seeking to enhance their digital capabilities.

ipo.title: Initial Public Offering
ipo.description: Potential IPO on European exchanges within 5-7 years, subject to market conditions.

privateEquity.title: Private Equity Investment
privateEquity.description: Secondary sale to private equity investors for continued growth and eventual larger exit.

cta.title: Interested in Investing?
cta.description: Contact our investor relations team to learn more about current investment opportunities and to request our detailed investor deck.
